title: The Sustainable Fashion Toolkit- A Fashion Takes Action and PwC Collabotation
description: A FREE online sustainable fashion Toolkit bringing together hundreds of sustainable fashion resources in a centralized location. The goal is to break down barriers to sustainability by making resources that already exist accessible and easy to use.

title: Threads Fast Fashion Lesson Plans
description: A free online resource pack on the impact of fasion on people and the planet for Age Groups: 11- 14 & 7-11

title: Leading Your Digital Fashion Evolution
description: An interesting website on providing versatile and all-inclusive 3D fashion technology such as 3D scan clothing for everyone from independent fashion professionals to large enterprises.

title: H & M Looptopia
description: H & M Looptopia is an in-game world within the Roblox game platform. Players can enter this digital realm and explore a futuristic city filled with H & M clothing stores, interactive games and social areas. It is like a virtual mall where players can create, play and socialize with friends in a fully immersive experience

title: 2022 Sustainable Fashion Guide
description: What Is Sustainable Fashion? An Easy Guide For Beginners: definitions, facts and an explanation of eco-fashion related terms.
